parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: My name is Cesilia Pe√±a Guerrero

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: from Ingano Grande village, in Sondorillo.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I was sterilized when my daughter was one month old.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I went to the medical centre to register her,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and they wouldn‚Äôt give me the paperwork I needed to register her in Sondorillo.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: They didn't give it to me,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: they said that I should be sterilised,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: or that my husband should be sterilised.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: They said it was harder to get men to have the surgery,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: that it was better if they sterilized me instead.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: They said they would help us out.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: And then they brought us to Huancabamba,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and I had the surgery there.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: But they never remembered the promises they made,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: And that‚Äôs why we are here now,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: us and other other ladies here,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: we want some help so that we can support ourselves.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: My children are at school and I can hardly work.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: My belly hurts, my brain hurts, my head hurts.
